name: Retrocat
description: Retrocat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a soldier's background, it brings a unique blend of strength and intelligence to the group. Its retro console buttons and cat-like arms and legs give it a charming appearance. The broken screen adds a touch of mystery, leaving others wondering what secrets lie beneath. Equipped with glasses as an addon, Retrocat has a keen eye for details and a sharp intellect. Despite its broken screen, Retrocat is a reliable and resourceful companion, always ready to support its club members with its unique set of skills.
